short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A modern tool for research. Just two clicks to generate and publish a custom poll.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A modern tool for research. 
Just one click generates a custom poll from the content you're consuming.

AI-generated polls form good questions that drive engagement and discussion. Reduce the effort to gather data that clarifies issues.

Community Polls, available here on the Chrome Store, employs artificial intelligence to facilitate research via instant poll creation and one-click publishing to social platforms. 
The tool is designed for user-friendly interaction and real-time insights.

Unlock this sophisticated research mechanism — 
made simple. Spot trends before others.

Features:
- Execute the extension on any web page — AI effortlessly creates an engaging poll 
- One-click to publish to X
- Or, save the poll and use it anywhere (WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, Slack, etc.)

How-it-works:
- When invoked, the extension reads the content on most web pages, this includes scraping tweets, web pages, news articles, blogs, and many other forms of content on the web.
